name: Panic at the restaurant
description:
Panic at the restaurant is a low poly designed 3D local multiplayer game with a top down perspective.

Inspired by Overcooked, panic at the restaurant is a panic cooking game from 1 to 4 controllers in which players need to cook and deliver different dishes fast enough.

The fastest you cook, the longer you'll survive !

This is the first game I've fully completed. It took me about 3 months to complete.

Game developer : Adrien Darcel (features main dev)

Game developer : Bastien Bodino ( + sound design)

Game developer : Nicolas Bloch

Game developer : Lucas Poinsot
